description: The initiative focuses on promoting biodynamic agriculture, a holistic approach that integrates cosmic and earthly forces to enhance soil vitality and food quality. It emphasizes the interconnectedness of all life forms within a farm ecosystem, with preparations that are believed to harness cosmic forces and promote a more vibrant and nutrient-rich food supply. The initiative aims to create a community of farmers and consumers dedicated to sustainable practices, free from agrochemicals, while fostering a deeper understanding of food's role in human health and environmental stewardship.
name: Totta Terra
